title: How Insomniac Refined Combat In Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales
summary:
Part of living out the superhero fantasy is harnessing your favorite character's abilities and feeling the power they wield.
Marvel's Spider-Man did an amazing job of making you feel like Peter Parker by allowing you to zip around New York warehouses and bash bad guys with a plethora of cool spider powers and geeky gadgets.
The trick for Insomniac this time around was how it could duplicate the fun of the original system while adapting it for a new hero, Miles.
Join us as we sit down with Cameron Christian, game director at Insomniac Games, as he takes us through how Miles will feel different in combat and how suit mods will make for varied and fun fights with New York City's den of criminals.
We hope you're enjoying this month of coverage on Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales!
